bibdata.title: American National Standard--Requirements for Power-Line Carrier Line Traps
American National Standard--Requirements for Power-Line Carrier Line Traps

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard applies to a line trap inserted into a power circuit to minimize carrier-frequency signal losses. The standard covers line traps in which the main coil is designed as a single phase, air-cooled inductor of the dry type.

This standard applies to a line trap inserted into a power circuit to minimize carrier-frequency signal losses. The standard covers line traps in which the main coil is designed as a single phase, air-cooled inductor of the dry type.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
